1.content:
Clara Fife, a famous, well-known rockstar gal in the Bit Bites band. She is known for crowd surfing with loose items for her fans to take and remember her and the night from. So when her biggest fans went for her boots and socks, then to play with her feet, she wasn't to suprised nor mad about it! Infact she was having a great time~

But, we need to figure out more of where we are first. SO, are you...
1.title: Intro

14.content:
The next part is to better determine who you are, and should have some impact on future options! Below is some examples...

Someone Nice
For the more general experiences like teasy footplay, maybe some tickles and massaging

Secret Fetishist
For an experience that starts a bit slow and potentially Clara being a tease, but builds fast into more fun stuff like foot worship, footjobs, even potentially footgrowth

Her slave

A Scientist
Purely for a more sci-fi / fantasy experience, involving footgrowth, futa tf, and honestly anything your inventions and potions can do within story rules

Other Options?
Try your best to never close it off, and always include a "more/Other options" chapter for others to add onto
14.title: Who, are you?

choices: Something that is a mix of options 1-3
Something about her secret kinks or wishes
144.content:
Clara gave off a sigh and whipped her her forehead as the band was finishing picking there stuff up and loading them into the van. For this she had to put back on her boots and socks, as much as she wanted to keep them off since the fox twins earlier took them off during her surf to play with her feet. Though the weirdest experience she had during one of her shows, they were some of her biggest fans who came to every show, and she knew a bit personally.

As the crew loaded the last thing on, she told them to be back in a few hours, as she has someone to meet for a bit first.
Heading off the stage, where the planed meet was behind the curtains, there stood a rather smart looking person, wearing the scientist stereotypical lab coat get-up. After a few minutes of chat, the two head to the lab, where all of the equipment is and ready to test.

For you see, Clara had signed up to test...
144.title: After Party Brainiac

info.brief_description: Taking a different, more foot fetishy spin on an all-time favorite of mine.
info.description:
First off, the characters Clara Fife, Willy and Wally, the story and art, belongs to the DA User Blackthorn Pub https://www.deviantart.com/blackthornpubl
The art can be found here; https://www.deviantart.com/blackthornpubl/art/Flashpoint-319920692
and the story here; https://www.deviantart.com/blackthornpubl/art/THORN-Flashpoint-pdf-283668624

SO! Now the twist.

         In the original story, it's kind of set like notes taking from the detectives trying to figure out what happened during the Bit Bites show (Clara's band) The spark cannons went off in the worst way possible and had scarred everyone away, and so forth.

INSTEAD, we are looking at how the rest of the night would go if that DIDN'T happen, and potentially with a different character you play as, instead of Willy and Wally.

As for rules, try to keep longer paragraphs (unless it's specific things such as character descriptions for example)
Foot Fetish ONLY, though there is an exception for Hyper, Futa, Multi-Cock growth, and Urethral play, please remeber that Clara's Feet are the main subject here!
That said, footgrowth is also very loved and encuraged too~ ;3
However! NO Scat, Piss, Gore or death.

Other then... Have some fun with this alt version of Flashpoint!
